title: Looking for a room in exchange for home improvements
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Professional tradesman looking for a room in exchange for home improvements.

can take on  work including:
- demolitions
- painting decorating ( internal/external / woodwork, with complete restoration if required)
- handyman jobs
- light plumbing, electrics 
- can also take on garden work , landscaping etc

Looking for 2 months stay  if everything goes well we could extend.


I  am professional with over 10 years  in trade with own tools.

This is a barter deal must benefit both parties
